docs.lead_paragraph: THESE are the people who, at this Christmas time, are most in want. These are selected by the city's four leading charities as the neediest families in New York. They need Christmas, a Christmas of simple, vital, urgent aid. They need food and clothing, shelter and fuel.

headline.main: " Blessed is he that considereth the poor." ;- Psalms, xli., 1.; NEW YORK'S 100 NEEDIEST CASES CHARITY ORGANIZATIONS 100 NEEDIEST CASES CHARITY ORGANIZATIONS' 100 NEEDIEST CASES
